posts.post_title: FS: T207 Ivan Olson & Bris Lord both SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi. I have these 2 which I need to sell to raise funds for a purchase from another board member. I'd like to get what I paid but will listen to all serious offers.
T207 Briscoe Lord Recruit SGC 50 (should be a 60) SOLD!
T207 Ivy Olson Recruit SGC 50 $55. SOLD
Paypal preferred, no fees - money order - check if absolutely necessary. Postage with delivery conf. free.
Thanks!
